translations: n.[数]常量，[数]常数；物理常数（constant 的复数）

phrs.translation: 恒流；定量流动；常廉流稳恒流；恒流定量消耗
恒速；固定比率；恒定流量

sentences.sentence: Maybe this is consistent with a change in the constants, but this would be the very first, and it would just change our view of the laws of nature.
sentences.translation: 也许这与常数变化相一致，但这是第一次，它将会改变我们对自然规律的看法。

sentences.sentence: Finally, younger ecologists have found ecological problems involving behavior and life-history adaptations more attractive than measuring physical constants.
sentences.translation: 最后，年轻一代的生态学家发现，涉及行为和生活史适应的生态问题比测量物理常量更有吸引力。

sentences.sentence: Any normalization constants will be rescaled.
sentences.translation: 任何归一化常数都将被重新排序。
